message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it's a great deal for something of such high quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm comfortable with.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit over budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
